name: Infinite Growth (itch)
description:
Infinite Growth: Develop your city through the industrial age in this retro-style management game! Build housing, production infrastructure, connect your districts with roads and research new technologies. Never stop growing or you will fail! Check the Info menu in-game for instructions on how to play. Also, the "Restart" button takes a few seconds to work! 

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #51

Controls: WASD to move the camera, right click to build the selected object, ERTYUI to quickly select buildings

Strategy Guide: Early on, focus on using adjacency bonuses of different types, and as the game goes on move on to using large districts of the same type
